description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to increase access to and improve the quality of urban infrastructure and services in the country#s two largest cities, Abidjan and Bouak#. The achievement of this objective would support GoCI#s efforts to demonstrate visible and tangible improvements in the lives of its citizens, a critical step for sustaining social and political stability and economic recovery in the country.
